module.name: screen-handler
module.description: Find wally in an image using a template
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long:
This module allows the user to load an image and detect the required template using various template tracking methods.
To use the module do the following: - Load and image with the dedicated rpc command - Once the image is loaded, the user can select to use a template track method on a particular template (rpc) - the position of the tracked template is then accessible via a dedicaded command.

output.description: streams out the user image with results of tracking.
